sourcesContent:
import React, { useState , useEffect } from 'react'; import './CSS/dash.css'; import Ellipse from "../assests/Ellipse 1.png"; import line1 from "../assests/Line 1.png"; import line2 from "../assests/Line 2.png"; import line3 from "../assests/Line 3.png"; import rect1 from "../assests/rect1.jpg"; import rect2 from "../assests/rect2.jpg"; import Portfolio from "../assests/portfolio.png"; function Dashboard(Profile) { const [age, setage] = useState(""); const [assets, setassets] = useState(""); const [liabilities, setliabilities] = useState(""); const [cibil, setcibil] = useState(""); const [fixedincome, setfixedincome] = useState(""); const [fixedexpense, setfixedexpense] = useState("");
